transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir. Sir, maine ticket raise kiya hai by supply conflict mein. But complaint jaise ki aapne bola hai na to complaint aap bhi kijiye sir. Kyunki na jo client hai na K line wale wo hamare paid client nahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Halaki humne wo paid nahi hoga wo bas profile bana rakha hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Profile bana rakhi hai. Aapko team ka call agar aayega na to aap unko screenshot dobara se bhej dena. Maine ye bhej diya unko. Aur team ka bhi call aayega aapke pass sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji. Aur aap complaint supervisor se baat kiya tha?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To bol raha hai ki jo client hai usse baat kiye usko pasand nahi aaya hai. Wo pura bol raha hai kaam achcha nahi hua. Pura change karo usko hata ke pura dusra banao ye wo bol raha hai. Payment aapko jitna mila hai aur payment hum bole bhai 70000 ka kaam kiya hu 25000 aap mila hai to kya mila hai mujhe pura full payment chahiye na. Pura kaam khatam ho gaya aapka client se kya deal hai wo aap log dekhenge na. Ab jo kaam aapne karwaya hai us kaam ka jo process hai wo process se pura maine kiya hai. Aur hand work ka to jo kaam hona hai to hand work ka to aisa hi hoga upar niche thoda to result aayega hi. Ab plus wo jo technique ka kaam hai uska wahi result aata hai. Wo patch wala design hai wo patch banega hi. Abhi ek ye jo design hai na texture ka isme kya hota hai paper stick kiya jata hai paper wall ke upar. Thik hai. To wall ke upar paper stick karne ke baad fir uske upar painting hota hai. To jahan bhi jis jo bhi paper ka jo bhi joining area aayega jahan jahan pe do paper join honge waha pe to patch dikhega hi na joint. To ye normal si cheez hai us client ko wo cheez samajh mein nahi aa raha hai. Unko lag raha hai aisa matlab unko chahiye kya pura wall ek jaisa hi dikhe. To pura ek single full wall pe ek hi single paper lagaega tab to pura ek dikhega na. Jab joining banega to joint to dikhega hi.
Executive: Haan haan samajh rahi hu mai.
Customer: To jo joint dikhega hi ha finishing ki baat hai wo sirf finishing nahi aaya ye wo to us uske liye pura paisa hi nahi dena hai. To aisa thodi hota hai. Us uska jo kaam hai uska process hi wahi hai usme patch banega hi banega. Wo dikhega hi line mein aisa. To aapko design choose karna hai wo aapka mistake hai ki aapne galat design choose kiya hai. Galat item aapne banwaya hai. Isme kaam karne wale ki thodi koi problem hai. Thik hai fir bhi to aisa to hota nahi hai ki aap kaam karwa lo payment na do. Ab aapka jo bhi deal hai wo aap aapke aap client se baat karo ya to aapko pehle hi bolna chahiye tha ki ha bhai kaam aap karoge pasand nahi aayega to client final karega tab aapko paisa milega nahi to nahi milega. Pehle hi aapko ye sab clear karna chahiye tha. Abhi aap kaam hone ke baad ya to aap jab first ek room mein kaam kiya tha to pata chal jata ek hi room mein. Thik hai. Ye full final pura kaam khatam hone ke baad thodi pata chal raha hai. Aapko first time mein bolna chahiye tha dikhwa ke ki bhai ruk jao nahi karo ha karo customer ko pasand nahi aa raha. To ek hi wall mein khatam ho jata kahani. Maine bhi kal aaya inko call kiya unhone call answer nahi kiya mera. Maine char panch bar call kiya unko.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To abhi hamari jo legal team hai wahi dekhegi isko aur ye complaint aap bhi kijiye sir kyunki solution jitne jaldi ho sake utna achcha hai aapke liye bhi.
Executive: Haan wahi mai abhi jata hu abhi niklunga mai wo yaha se ek ghanta lagega jane mein 20-25 kilometer dur hai. To ja ke ab jis area mein maine kaam kiya hai usi area ke police station jana padega na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan to waha hoke near by police station ja ke mai wo complaint karta hu ki bhai aisa aisa maine yaha pe kaam kiya hai. Is aadmi ne kaam karwaya hai aur abhi is tarah ka wo response nahi de raha wo.
Executive: Supervisor se mai baat karu kya ek bar?
Customer: Supervisor se?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan thik hai aap ek bar baat kijiye mai number share karta hu aapko.
Executive: Ji. Usme aapke check mein ek number diya hai unhone. Ke liye aapko ek number diya tha na baat karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan wahi number wahi number.
Executive: Haan haan haan wahi number wahi supervisor ka number hai ha.
Executive: Achcha thik hai mai ek bar baat karti hu sir.
Customer: Haan thik hai. Thik hai okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving full payment for work.

- Client unhappy with the wallpaper design.

- Client refuses to pay the full amount.

- Customer wants executive to file complaint.



Resolution:

- Executive will file a police complaint.

- Executive shared supervisor's number with executive.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will contact supervisor.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, client issue, complaint
